intro: Synaedrys javensis, commonly known as the Java star vine, is a climbing plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its opposite, elliptical leaves and small, clustered white flowers. Its fruits are berries that turn red when mature, attracting various bird species. Synaedrys javensis is often used in horticulture for its ornamental value and ability to climb structures.
